author: James Daft
comment: A good idea in theory and I like the way the jokes pop up on the watch. Unfortunately I get the same 10 or so jokes on repeat, the long jokes have the end cut off when you scroll down and I only get 1 or 2 jokes a day despite setting the frequency to the highest setting.

author: Tombo Gaming
comment: Works fine. Better is I could just open the app on my watch and scroll through joke categories, like maybe 5 types of jokes and I can scroll through them. Please respond with your honest thoughts, thanks again
title: Hmmm

author: Chris Hartzel
comment: I like the idea of this app and the jokes are great to see randomly.  Just one thing.  When the joke pops up the, screen stays on for a long time taking up precious battery of my moto360.  Could you please make a setting to turn off screen sooner?  Also the once the screen turns off I do not see the joke when i turn the screen back on so I may miss it.

reply.author: Kanda Software
reply.content: Hi Chris! So glad you're loving Jokester! Many thanks for your idea! We'll try to implement it with future releases.

author: Kenneth Bowker
comment: I had this app working fine. Now im lucky if i get one joke a day are you running out of jokes? Could be a great app

reply.author: Kanda Software
reply.content: Hi Kenneth. Jokes are refreshed every couple of days automatically. There is no need to download anything. You can control how many jokes you want to receive per day – anywhere from 1 to 20. Open the app on your smartphone and set the frequency. Thanks for your comment!

title: No jokes

author: savage gaming
comment: I'm really mad because It did not show up on my watch and I dont know how to activate it for my watch please reply soon if I get help I will rate this five stars

author: jarrod bless
comment: Needs more jokes daily. I have everything turned on and up and I hardly get like 1 a day
title: Good but...

author: chook ™
comment: Very random and infrequent delivery of jokes even when set to often. Not a vast database of jokes get a lot of double ups. It's OK...

author: Gavin Blake
comment: I was quite looking forward to this app, but I can't get it to work no matter what I try. I have the Sony SmartWatch 3

reply.author: Kanda Software
reply.content: Hi Gavin! Could you please let us know what exactly is not working? What happens after you installed the app on your phone....what then? Our email is jokester@kandasoft.com. Thank you!

title: Doesn't work with SmartWatch 3

comment: Won't even open on my ZTE Quartz.
